== Bio ==
Gunnar Bøe is the Managing Director of UNINETT Sigma2 since January 1st,
2015. He has previously held a position as section manager for campus
networks and systems at UNINETT. This included managing the
UNINETT@campus program. He has also been the project manager for an
information security project at UNINETT, which assists universities and
university colleges with information security management. Before joining
UNINETT in 2003, he worked with Ericsson in several positions overseas,
in infrastructure, with network design and with research and
development. Gunnar Bøe has a Master degree in Computer Science from the
Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU) in 1993.
